properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating first American to orbit the earth on February 20, 1962, at Cape Canaveral, Florida, U.S.A., by Lieutenant Colonel John Glenn, Jr., U.S. Marine Corps., with “Friendship 7” Mercury space capsule; cancellation stamp dated February 20, 1984 in Cape Canaveral; includes information on reverse.
